Posts.Content: I have been on a standard dose of Xeloda for almost 8 months and if my next PET is good my Dr. wants to leave me on Xeloda but on a greatly reduced dose. Does anyone have any experience with this? Thanks
Posts.Title: Xeloda as maintenance therapy

Posts.Content: It sounds like you're having a terrible time. I know we're lucky to live in a time with so many medications but I sure wish they could come up with help for the side effects. Good luck!
Posts.Title: femara side effects

Posts.Content: I have been on femara as follow-up therepy for metastatic breast cancer. I am experiencing a great deal of joint and back pain and was wondering if anyone else has experienced this and what they found that helps with the pain. Thanks
Posts.Title: femara side effects

Posts.Content: most drug companies offer some type of financial support for covering the costs of your drugs. Look on the web site for the companies that produce your med's Good luck. I'm afraid their will be more and more people in your shoes in the near future.
Posts.Title: how to i find financial help

Posts.Content: I’m just curious if anyone else is missing chemo infusions because of the Doxil shortage. I’m being told that it will be late August before the drug is available again.
Posts.Title: Doxil shortage
